title: People's Socialist Republic of Albania
summary: The People's Socialist Republic of Albania (Albanian: Republika Popullore Socialiste e Shqipërisë) was the Marxist-Leninist one party state that existed in Albania from 1976 to 1992.[2] From 1944 to 1946, the state of Albania was known as the Democratic Government of Albania and from 1946 to 1976 it was known as the People's Republic of Albania.
